body: @xRizo How much does it cost and where i can commisioned a doujinshi bro?

Fuck sake, I commisioned this chapter 3 years ago. Who the fuck is wasting their money and getting chapters which already have translations, translated AGAIN. You're wasting your money! Here's an idea, use the money to get some of the non-translated chapters done. Fucking Moron.
There's something about the art and the outrageousness of the situations that makes this guy's works, so fucking hot.

MF who have so much money plz give me . This anon guy keeps on commissioning the chapter which have already been translated. Or is this a trick so that someone give money for the ( not translated) chapters?
